155332222122.content: Who could he have run into in his new floating form?
155332222122.title: Someone Else

1553322221222.content:
AJ kept on floating about rapidly, bounding around in different directions trying to find someone to help. He was begininng to panic now, with no hope in sight for his unusual prediciment. All of a sudden however, as he shot down a narrow path, he noticed a girl standing with her back to him. "Hey!" he tried calling out. It was no use and the girl did not hear his calls. Trying another form of contact, he tried reaching out to touch her on the shoulder. As he came in contact with her however, everything went black. The world around him disapeared from sight, though he could still feel something. It were as though he were being pulled in to a tight space of some sort. The numbness that resided over his form began to disapear as he felt human in shape and form again. Opening his eyes, he took a deep gasp for breath, as if he had been holding it in underwater before release. 'Ouch, that was rough' he thought as he held on to his head. Looking about through hazy eyes however, he saw the girl had vanished from view. Instead, a concerned man from one of the market stalls came over to check on him for some reason

"You alright there darling?" he asked, voicing concern for AJ's current state. He asked it in a strange way though. "Darling?" AJ muttered, groggy from the experience. Something seemed off about his voice however. The hair on his head seemed different too. He began to follow it downwards as the owner continued. "Did you bump your head on something little lady?" he asked again. "Lady? Mate...". AJ stopped right there as he covered his mouth. His voice definatly sounded ladylike. Very unlike his own. It was the voice of someone else on the square. Looking down nervously, AJ saw a sight a million miles different to the usual view of his own body. For a starter, his hands were white instead of there usual brown. They were also slender and feminine. He also noticed the long hair that he had been following down. It had gone far beyond his normal lenghs, stretching down to mid chest at the least. And there he saw the strangest sight of all. Two mounds sticking out from underneath a girly red sweater. He could feel them attached to him. A perfect paid of breasts.

"Well thats what you are me thinks" the man interupted as AJ began to look at himself in shock. "Maybe you should go get some rest love". AJ was too shocked to even answer. He just began to run off, away from the crowded scene around him. He felt a bag hanging over his shoulder, which he held on to as he ran for cover. His long hair whipped about his face as he ran. His breasts also bounced underneath the jumper. This was all very sureal. He could only think of one place to run at this point and that was back to the garage. Racing through the ajar door he had left, he shut it swiftly behind him as to avoid the outside world. To his delight, Phil and Dexter were not back yet. Needing to find a mirror of some sort, AJ eventually settled on glass window of the car he had been working on. There, it it's relfection, he saw the weirdest sight of his life. Looking back to him was Lauren Branning. She was wearing the same look of shock and panic that he could definatly sense he was wearing at this point. She looked right back at him. Thats when he realised it. He was now Lauren.

He looked down at himself once more. He could see her slim, lovely body now attached to him from the neck down. Looking back at the window, so did she. "This is...so freaky" he exclaimed, eyeing himself as to understand what was happening. His voice sounded exactly like hers too. AJ however, in his imature sense of mind, could not stay in panic mode forever. In fact, looking back at what was now his relfection, he made a cheeky little grin appear on her face. "Well this is certainly new" he noted, looking down at his body. He moved his hands up to Laurens chest and gave a tight squeeze on her breasts. "Oh wow, thats good!" he exclaimed, the alien feeling exciting him. He continued onwards as he looked back at himself, a hint of lust in her eyes, now his. "Well I'd give her a go admitedly" he giggled. "I guess I technically can now"! He moved a hand south to the tight fabric of his jeans around his crotch. The sensation hit him like a jolt of lightning.

"This is going to be a fun afternoon indeed!" AJ exclaimed, thinking over what he could do in the lovely teenage girls body. Where could he go to do it however?

info.brief_description: One for all you Brits on here =)
info.description:
A Body Snatching story based in the popular long running British drama series known as Eastenders.
One of the boys of Albert Square get to play out there favourite fantasies after they get body snatching powers from drinking something funny in the 'queen vic'.

1. Charecters can't die
2. Only charecters from Eastenders
